## margin() function

Add margins around text.

Applies top, bottom, left, and right margins to text content.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function margin(s: string, options: MarginOptions): string;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

s


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The text to add margins to


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[MarginOptions](./terminal-reflowjs.marginoptions.md)


</td><td>

Margin configuration


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string

The text with margins applied

## Example


```ts
margin("Hello", { left: 4, top: 1 });
// "\n    Hello"
```
